reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size and is perfect for plus-sized women, with one noting it's ideal as a bridesmaid dress.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable , perfect black dress
items.body: Comfortable dress, nice fabric, the length was good. I am 5'7" I wore a 1"heel and the dress length was floor length. I purchased a size 20 based on the suggested sizes. The dress was a little big around the bust area, but other than that fit was great. My measurements 42 bust area, waist 43 " and hip 47" Read more
items.author: vilma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: This dress was perfect for my son's wedding on a hot, August day. Ruched chiffon for the WIN! It was light, flowy, flattering and very comfortable to wear all day. I threw it in the washer on the gentle cycle and hung to dry. It needed a light steaming the day of the wedding. The length was great (I am 5'6"). It is a great value for the money. It did need a pin to keep the cleavage under control, but otherwise fit very nicely Read more
items.author: Jennifer Grubb

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and confortable.
items.body: This dress was so lightweight, comfortable and very flattering. The only problem I had was it was cut very low in the bust area and I using a pin did not look nice because it was bunched up and I did not want to be pulling it up all night. Other than that it was well made. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: This dress is beautiful and fit well. I'm very satisfied! Read more
items.author: Mary Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised!!!!!
items.body: Very nice dress! I’m a size 24-26 and this dress fit so comfortably. It hugged all my curves. I was worried as I never ordered a formal dress from Amazon before but to my surprise it fit and looked better than I could’ve imagined. If you’re a plus size beauty this is a great pick for a “Black dress” Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Please examine well
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The fabric on the outer layer of the dress was damaged, it looks as if something snagged the entire right side of the dress. The pleats were not layered properly. I love how the dress fits, the color, and the length. I am just disappointed that they did not check to ensure there was no damages before packing and shipping it to me. Read more
items.author: Pamela Adegun

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for the large chested
items.body: I sized up and it still was too tight on my chest. Just kind of awkward ruching there but the rest flowed well and went all the way to the ground (I'm 5'2"). Nice fabric but has to be handwashed Read more
items.author: L

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfy and good quality
items.body: Very comfy, dress was beautiful and shoulders stayed up the entire time! Read more
items.author: Katie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Evening V Neck Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Evening V Neck Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Lavender, Grey Blue, Sage Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
